item.description:
The beginning of a new year is the perfect time to learn how to make the most of your time!  Self management is a skill we could always use more of, and Greg Spurr, local investor, has put together a system to teach you how to raise your level of productivity for the new year.  Things he will cover at the meeting:

 

Bright Shiny Object syndrome: Constantly chasing the next best thing and feeling pulled towards the newest and latest "magic pill" out there

Business A.D.D. or lack of focus: Spending more of your day reacting to things rather than proactively building your business and/or growing your profits

Focusing on the wrong things: When you're not really clear on what the right things are

Information Overload: Afraid of missing something important for your REI business, but also overwhelmed with just getting through emails each day

 

What you will learn: 

*How to uncover your highest leverage activities that will bring you maximum results

*Why "making yourself strong first" is the key to lasting success

*The real traps that rob you of your productivity

 


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
 


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Self Management and How It Relates to Your Productivity
